work.description: I'm working as an engineer for the Platform Core API of Mural, most specifically in the building of the new Webhooks API.
I have worked on the WEX EDGE product, which is focused on providing purchase and payment solutions for hotels, fuel, tires and orther fleet relevant products and services.

During my time at EISA, a subsidiary of Ericsson, I had the opportunity to work with huge telecomunication softwares for customers from Brazil and Ukraine. In January of 2019 I had the opportunity to trave to Kyiv, Ukraine to provide on site support to our customers.
During my staying at VXCase I have worked in the development of a mobile app used by the managers to control the business and I also acted on the development of the internal ERP of the company

education.title: Master on Systems and Products Engineering
education.details: Federal Institute of Bahia campus Salvador (IFBA), 2019 - Now

accomplishments.title: Ericsson on site support in Kyiv - Ukraine
accomplishments.details: During 2019 I had the opportunity to be in Kyiv providing on site support to the Ericsson Team abou the systems me and my team worked at EISA.

accomplishments.title: 2nd Place in an innovation contest
accomplishments.details: IFBA organizes a contest called "Uma ideia na cabeça uma inovação na mão" yearly. In 2016 had me as the second place with a proposal of using the Kinect API to improve the teaching-learning process of biology classes for the DNA studies.

accomplishments.title: My code became example in a compiler!
accomplishments.details: That was probably the first achievement of my carrer. I made a keyboard-based paint editor in Pascal on 2012. It has been accepted in the brazilian compiler PascalZim as the "EditorHugo.pas" example!

accomplishments.title: Presentation of talks/workshops/lives
accomplishments.details: I really enjoy sharing my knowledge and learn more at the same time! So, I have already presented in many events like SEMCOMP, SNCT, Linguagil, Love Bits Lives, Software Freedom Day and others.
